attributes.action: Agree to an independent and unrestricted inquiry into how and why Britain went to war with Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All previous Iraq related inquiries have been limited in
their scope and have had restrictions imposed as to what
evidence might be brought before them.

Faith in the government, and politicians in general, has
been severely undermined by this country's involvement
in the Iraq war and the reasons we were given to justify
it.
